sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Size parameter can be tainted, leading to buffer overflows or out-of-bounds access.

sinks.name: TEE_MemCompare
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be manipulated to cause out-of-bounds access, leading to potential memory corruption or exposure of sensitive data.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Destination pointer could be tainted, leading to writing to an unintended memory location.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Source pointer could be tainted, leading to reading from an unintended memory location.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be manipulated, leading to buffer overflows or out-of-bounds access.

sinks.name: TEE_Wait
sinks.reason: Event identifier could be manipulated to cause improper waiting behavior.

sinks.name: snprintf
sinks.reason: Unencrypted output to Normal World could expose sensitive data.

sinks.name: snprintf
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be manipulated leading to buffer overflow or truncation issues.

sinks.name: strlen
sinks.reason: Missing input validation could lead to undefined behavior if a tainted pointer is passed.
